title: BeyondTrust Password Safe - Management and Secret Safe Insights
description: - This dashboard provides insights into management and secret safe activity performed on password safe.

definition.content:
**BeyondTrust Password Safe** is a privileged access management solution that securely stores, manages, and rotates privileged credentials (like administrative or root passwords) used to access critical systems. It automates password rotation and provides comprehensive session monitoring and recording to help organizations maintain strict control over privileged credentials.

This dashboard provides insights into management and secret safe activity performed on password safe.

For more information, see the [BeyondTrust Password Safe Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/beyondtrust_password_safe/).

**Tips**:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

**Note**
- This dashboard is populated using Management and Secret Safe logs collected via the [Datadog Agent](https://docs.datadoghq.com/agent/).
- Please follow the **Agent and Event Forwarder Configuration** steps [here](/integrations/beyondtrust-password-safe) to enable log collection.

definition.title: Top Users by Secrets Safe Activity
Action Type Distribution by Secrets Safe Activity
Distribution of Managed system by Type

query.query_string: source:beyondtrust-password-safe @nvps.objecttype:System @nvps.operation:Add @managed_system:* (@nvps.details:"New auto-managed Password Safe System" OR "New un-managed Password Safe System") $user_name $client_ip $managed_system $managed_account

definition.title: System - Auto Password Management Status Changes

query.query_string: source:beyondtrust-password-safe @nvps.objecttype:System @nvps.operation:Update @nvps.details:("AutoManagementFlag changed to False ." OR "AutoManagementFlag changed to True .") $user_name $client_ip $managed_system $managed_account
